website_summaries.verdict: Jump start your fitness journey with a durable, light resistance band and avoid paying for bands you don't need.
pros: Red band for lightest workout - provides 3 to 7 kilos of resistance
208cm length works for many types of exercises

customer_reviews.title: Great bands
customer_reviews.text: The bands are great quality and easy to identify the different resistance levels because they’re labeled . They come in a cute bag that you can take with you on the go. Love these. Great addition to my growing gym room
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice rubber resistance loop
customer_reviews.text: The product are nice for weight-lifting for novice user or basic practices. Not very ideal for those who are already trained for years since the loading is not very heavy. Sometimes they will be curled and make me feel a little uncomfortable for some pose. But overall this product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Had the whole family doing a little work out last night with these (including my 13 and 6 year olds). They were easy, strong and surprisingly a really great workout in no time. We all felt the burn. Looking forward to really getting them into our workout routines.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cowling

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: These are good beginner set, using them at home since all gyms are closed in our areas. It would be nice if the products are marked with actual resistance, ie, in pounds, in addition to extra light, light, medium, etc..
customer_reviews.author: umic c

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: Love the so many options! Extra light and extra heavy is awesome for variety. I like it comes with a carry bag so they can stay together at home or on the go!
customer_reviews.author: priscilla vargas

customer_reviews.title: Excited to try!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to try these out. I had a set similar to these but I gave them to my sister. They’re very versatile and these seem to be higher quality than my last set too! I also like that the mesh bag is so flexible and it’s really easy to fit all of the bands back in. No weird folding or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed purchase
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these. Was looking forward to switching up my workout with these but they tend to roll regardless of material I wear etc. They would be easy to use if they’d stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Great bands!
customer_reviews.text: Bands are perfect for any level of fitness person. You get out what you put in.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The material is good and the elasticity varies from each band and I like how they marked the difference. Also comes with a mini brochure of exercises that you could do with these bands and is very helpful. Overall it looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Naga

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by these bands. I like how they were color coded and clearly labeled. They were easy to use. There is also an instruction manual that came with them showing how to use the bands.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eaves

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to get back in to working out. I don't always have time to hit the gym . Resistance loop bands help me get in a workout at home .
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They work really well and i love the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Powell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday workout
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several bands and these did not disappoint. Love the resistance they offer and great for my everyday workouts.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca colon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect giant rubber bands
customer_reviews.text: These resistance band loops are perfect for what I need them for. Would definitely order from this company again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Langhorst

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It came just in time, for my home fitness. Easy to use. It also has instructions with simple but useful exercises
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised. Different levels of stretch seem to be as intended. Wife uses them to do core strength training at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for a week - seem durable and are as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of these. The resistance band i got in physical therapy was the kind they tie to the appropriate length. Because of this, it kept getting bunched up and cut into my legs. These are the perfect range of resistance without the tie. The strap almost feels "soft" and it distributes the pressure evenly on your body so you can focus more on working out and less on discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mem427

customer_reviews.title: Solid resistance bands
customer_reviews.text: Great for doing legwork/adding resistance to regular workouts. Comes with several bands in several resistance weights. Comes in a small drawstring bag and also includes a paper which shows some workouts that can be done. Nice touch. Only thing I wish is that each band would have the resistance in lbs on the band itself. Instead they go by color and say 'heavy' or 'x-heavy' etc. There's a paper which explains the resistance of each band but I see zero reason why that wouldn't be on the band itself just to make it easier to identify than colors I'll update this if anything happens in terms of durability like a break of a band. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Nice exercise accessory for your lower body workouts.
customer_reviews.text: These bands are a nice accessory to add for your lower body exercises. They give you various resistance levels, labelled nicely and quite durable. Plus they are a solid value. I would recommend to look online for more exercises because there are many more exercises to use these with. I think these mini loop bands would be nice to pair with the Grassvery Resistance Bands with the handles that helps with the upper body.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed resistance bands for my at-home workouts. These fit that bill quite nicely. Plenty to like about these bands: * They're sturdily made * They're colorful * They're very clearly labeled, from "X-Light" to "X-Heavy" And, they come with a nice carry bag. I'm using these for leg exercises and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Player

customer_reviews.title: Work well and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: My step-son needed a set of these type of resistance bands for his military training. This set is very cost effective and exactly what he needed to help with strength training. They seem really durable and well made. He was extremely happy to get them and has been using them daily for a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: SKidwell

customer_reviews.title: Wide range of resistance
customer_reviews.text: These bands have a wide range of difficulty. I don’t think that I will ever use the X-Heavy because it’s resistance is so hard. They come in a box wrapped in plastic inside. These are well made bands.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very inferior Cheap quality material. Will not recommend for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Nana Osei
